name: Elvera
description:
Welcome into the realm of ELVERA, an Indie Third-Person PvP Action Game developed by a single developer. The game is completely free-to-play with no monetization, where player choice and strategy shape their experience.

From the mind of one, for the community of many, ELVERA offers a rich, evolving world where two factions fight for dominance. Each match is a fresh challenge, shaped by the unique abilities of a diverse roster of heroes, several unique events that happen during rounds and your strategy choices.

ELVERA stands out with its signature Twinbytes and Manifestation mechanic, inviting players to engage in a strategic dance of deception and unpredictability.

Free to all, ELVERA provides a balanced battlefield where tactics, not transactions, lead to triumph.

Join the Early Access on Steam, contribute to ELVERA's growth, and be part of our small, yet passionate community.
